Text.val: 19.03.2010 SH SCR15392 Changed logic to handled GB110 output
19.05.2009 SH SCR14647 Step2 Added updates INUP_MATURITYDATE and
11.05.2009 SH SCR14627 Added updates of PO.INTRSTCHRG_ADMNO/CLNTNO
13.02.2009 SH SCR14407 Added new arguments to GB110
22.04.2008 SH SCR13537 Step4 Removed update INUP_BALANCEFACTORINGC and
18.04.2008 SH SCR13537 Step4 Added update INUP_BALANCEFACTORINGC = 0
16.04.2008 SH SCR13537 Step1 Added storing of INUC if invoice amount is changed
-- Add one TIUB row for INVO_DUEDATE if not exist
-- Delete all TIUB rows where TIUB_CHANGEDATE > v.SELDATE
-- calculate balances for every change date

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INUC_INVFACTORINGCHANGEC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INUC where INUC_INVO_NO = :2 and INUC_VALUEDATE <= ':3' for fetch only

Text.val: -- Finaly fetch INUP (updated in GB110) to update PO.INTERESTC
-- GB110 has to be called with PI.DATEUNTIL = TIUB_CHANGEDATE -1 of the next
-- Use interest admn/client from GB110 where interest was calculated, in case of
no interest, the admn/client are both 0 in GB110. The calculation of interest >0
is related to the previous selected TIUB row.
